TriggerOraclev10g.name: WH_FACILITY_TRANS_ONHAND_AU
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
BEGIN
IF TRUNC(:NEW.rqst_dt) != TRUNC(:OLD.rqst_dt) THEN
UPDATE aps_alloc_onhand_oo
SET avail_dt = TRUNC(:NEW.rqst_dt)
WHERE wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr = :OLD.wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr ;
--
UPDATE aps_alloc_onhand_wo
SET avail_dt = TRUNC(:NEW.rqst_dt)
WHERE wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr = :OLD.wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr ;
--
UPDATE aps_alloc_onhand_ss
SET avail_dt = TRUNC(:NEW.rqst_dt)
WHERE wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr = :OLD.wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr ;
--
UPDATE aps_alloc_onhand_fc
SET avail_dt = TRUNC(:NEW.rqst_dt)
WHERE wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr = :OLD.wh_facility_trans_onhand_nbr ;
--
END IF;
END wh_facility_trans_onhand_au ;
